protocol.description:
Evaluation_Test_Type: All Valid: Forecast Test
Forecast_Test_Type: EvaluationNot recommended: series complete
General_Description: This test case describes when a child is administered four doses of mixed OPV/IPV Polio vaccine with one dose given at age 4 years and at an interval of 6 months from the previous that the dose is valid.  No further doses of the vaccine should be forecast.  The series is complete.
